entity.name: Nancy Pelosi
entity.description: US House of Representatives Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (CA-12)

text: @SpeakerPelosi Retirees have seen IRAs devastated by the impact of COVID19. Remove earned income requirement and cap on IRA contributions so retirees can start rebuilding their savings.  Roth IRAs should have those restrictions removed permanently.
